com.bfg.cart
Class CartItem

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.bfg.cart.CartItem
public class CartItem
extends java.lang.Object

CartItem is used to hold the product and quantity of a specific item in the cart.

Copyright 2002, James M. Turner No warranty is made as to the fitness of this code for any particular purpose. It is included for demonstration purposes only.

Author:
James M. Turner

public boolean isPromotionItem()
Determine if this is a free promotional item.
Returns:

getLineItemPrice

public double getLineItemPrice()
Get the price times the quantity for this item. If it is a promotional item, return zero.
Returns:
the quantity times the price, or zero for promotional items.

getLineItemPriceString

public java.lang.String getLineItemPriceString()
Returns a currency formatted version of the line item price, if the item is promotional, return the string "FREE!"
Returns:
A currency-formatted version of the line item price or "FREE!"
